// ==UserScript==
// @name iDope
// @icon data:image/png;base64,
// @connect *://idope.se/*
// @trackerURL https://idope.se/
// @version 1.0
// @require exKit
// ==/UserScript==

var code = {
  "version": 2,
  "type": "kit",
  "title": "iDope",
  "icon": "data:image/png;base64,",
  "desc": "",
  "downloadUrl": "",
  "tVersion": "",
  "search": {
    "loginUrl": "",
    "loginFormSelector": "",
    "searchUrl": "https://idope.se/torrent-list/%search%/",
    "nextPageSelector": {
      "selector": "div#showdivchild>div#div3>div#next",
      "attr": "href"
    },
    "baseUrl": "https://idope.se/",
    "requestType": "GET",
    "listItemSelector": "div#div2child>div.resultdiv",
    "torrentSelector": {
      "categoryTitle": ">div.resultdivbotton>div.resultdivbottoncategory",
      "categoryUrl": {
        "selector": ">div.resultdivbotton>div.resultdivbottoncategory",
        "attr": "href"
      },
      "title": ">div.resultdivtop>a",
      "url": {
        "selector": ">div.resultdivtop>a",
        "attr": "href"
      },
      "size": ">div.resultdivbotton>div.resultlength>div.resultdivbottonlength",
      "downloadUrl": {
        "selector": ">div.resultdivbotton>div#hideinfohash0",
        "attr": "href"
      },
      "seed": ">div.resultdivbotton>div.resultseed>div.resultdivbottonseed",
      "date": ">div.resultdivbotton>div.resulttime>div.resultdivbottontime"
    },
    "onGetValue": {
      "size": [
        "convertSize"
      ],
      "date": [
        {
          "name": "replaceRe",
          "re": "2",
          "text": "14"
        },
        "replaceToday",
        {
          "name": "timeFormat",
          "format": "2"
        }
      ]
    }
  },
  "uid": 1487676802
};

API_exKit(code);
